resources.string: In my city (I live in Ukraine, Dnepr) weather is warm, sunny, and comfortable in summer, i like go out with my friends and have fun. But not always i have got so weather. For example in spring i love only end of April and beginning of May, March doesn\'t amuse me at all. Especially amuses me first warm days in a year after winter. What can i say about autumn, it is beautiful season but a bit sadd. My least favourite season is winter, in spite of wonderful Christmas evening and etc., i do not like winter because of she\'s very cold days, when i want to stay at home and do not want to go anywhere.
